TEXT.S:
Randy Allen(Â·) 1 bulad 26 demiad, 1965 a mihca, Randy Allen, miunduay. Randy Allen unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u mikilac zikuzay mimaliay. Randy Allen nalecuhan i Milton, Florida, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza.
kakuniza nu kawaw:
